short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a tool to grab grades from the Gradezpr website and place them in PowerSchool.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a tool to grab grades from the Gradezpr website and place them into Powerschool.  You can also use this tool with any student data in your clipboard, as long as the data is in the form: 
FirstName LastName (-> Tab ->) Grade.  This is the default way that Excel copies to the clipboard.  

Using this extension is faster than using the built-in CSV import in PowerSchool.
